segments.text: Yes , Madam , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This room 117 , and we have just checked in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our room hasn't been cleaned up yet.So would you send one of your house keepers to clean up our room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . Madam , we'll come right away then . Your room number and your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our room number is 117 and my name is Terry Chen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , would you hang up and wait ?
segments.speaker: S2
